brandLine: We build things for the web
brandDescription: We are a team of software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, We are focused on building accessible, dynamic and fully Responsive Web apps
aboutUsText: Hello! We are webflow inc. and we enjoy creating things that live on the internet. Our interest in web development started back in 2021 Fast-forward to today, and We've had the privilege of working at an advertising agency, a start-up, a huge corporation, and a studentled design studio. Our main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a variety of clients. Here are a few technologies We've been working with recently: • JavaScript (ES6+) • React • Node.js • Express.js • MongoDB

projectDescription: A web app for improving online communication experience of users . View your Profile, messages and platform users.

A fully functioning ecommerce platform for byung smartphones. All user login/Sign up features implemented and tested. Users acan add there items to cart and proceed to checkout as per there requirements.

An amazing and fully fledge weather app. Users can see weather data from many cities located all around the globe. Our app is fully resposive and all code quality features were implemented while making of this app. weather data is fetched using openWeather Api.
